Instruction: Wash and trim the celery stalks, then thinly slice them.'
In a large bowl, combine sliced celery, sliced apple, and walnuts.'
In a small bowl, whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, honey, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.'
'Pour the dressing over the celery mixture.'
'Toss gently until everything is well coated.'
'Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.'
